pirate 0.0.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

Channel()

A Class which represents a channel object

Client()

A Class which represents the Client

connect()

Connect and authenticate to the websocket via a client

Emoji()

A Class which represents a guild emoji object

EventEmitter()

A Class which emits event, heavily modelled after Node.js

events.channel_create()

Event, emitted whenever a channel is being created

events.channel_delete()

Event, emitted whenever a channel is being deleted

events.channel_update()

Event, emitted whenever a channel gets an update

events.emojis_add()

Event, emitted whenever a new emoji is being added

events.emojis_remove()

Event, emitted whenever an emoji is being deleted

events.emojis_update()

Event, emitted whenever an emoji updates (for real)

events.guild_ban_add()

Event, emitted whenever a user gets hammered by the power of thor.

events.guild_ban_remove()

Event, emitted whenever a user ban is being revoked

events.guild_create()

Event, emitted whenever the bot joins a guild

events.guild_emojis_update()

Event, emitted whenever an Emoji is being updated

events.guild_integrations_update()

Event, emitted whenever a guild's integrations is being updated

events.guild_members_chunk()

Event, emitted whenever one sends a respond for GUILD_MEMBERS_CHUNK

events.guild_member_add()

Event, emitted whenever a user joins a guild

events.guild_member_remove()

Event, emits whenever a user leaves a guild

events.guild_member_update()

Event, emits whenever a member updates it's state

events.guild_remove()

Event, whenever a guild becomes unavilable or the bot has been removed from there

events.guild_role_create()

Event, emitted whenever a role is being created

events.guild_role_delete()

Event, emitted whenever a role is being deleted

events.guild_role_update()

Event, emitted whenever a role gets an update

events.guild_update()

Event, emitted whenever a guild updates it's contents

events.ready()

Event, emitted whenever the client finished the identifying phase

Guild()

A Class which represents a guild object

GuildMember()

A Class which represents a guild member

pirate-package

A Discord API Wrapper

Presence()

A Class which represents a presence object

Role()

A Class which represents a role object (exists in guilds only)

updates.presence()

A Function which is being used to update the client's presence

User()

A Class which represents a user object
